mapper.select:
select id, dat_st_id, crt_dt, mdfcn_dt, acdnt_info_id, acdnt_info_id_crt_dt, acdnt_info_id_mdfcn_dt, acdnt_ocrn_pstn, acdnt_ocrn_pstn_crt_dt, acdnt_ocrn_pstn_mdfcn_dt, spce_nm, spce_nm_crt_dt, spce_nm_mdfcn_dt, acdnt_ocrn_no, engn_code, acdnt_ocrn_yr, acdnt_ocrn_ymd, acdnt_ocrn_ddwk_cd, acdnt_ocrn_ddwk, dan_cd, dan_se, acdnt_ocrn_hr_cd, acdnt_ocrn_hr, stdg_cd, stdg_nm, acdnt_type_lclsf_cd, acdnt_type_lclsf, acdnt_type_sclsf_cd, acdnt_type_sclsf, acdnt_type_cd, acdnt_type_dtl, rg_vltn_cd, rg_vltn, acdnt_ocrn_pstn_xcrd, acdnt_ocrn_pstn_ycrd, wetr_stts_cd, wetr_stts, road_stle_cd, road_stle, hhdgw_at, wod_dge_cd, wod_dge, dcsd_cnt, swsn_cnt, sijn_cnt, inj_dcl_cnt, offe_vhcl_carmdl_lclsf_cd, offe_vhcl_carmdl_lclsf, offe_vhcl_carmdl_cd, offe_vhcl_carmdl, ar_wod_dge_lclsf_cd, ar_wod_dge_lclsf, ar_wod_dge_clsf_cd, ar_wod_dge_clsf, ar_age_cd, ar_age, ar_sexd_cd, ar_sexd, dmge_vhcl_carmdl_lclsf_cd, dmge_vhcl_carmdl_lclsf, dmge_vhcl_carmdl_cd, dmge_vhcl_carmdl, vm_wod_dge_lclsf_cd, vm_wod_dge_lclsf, vm_wod_dge_clsf_cd, vm_wod_dge_clsf, vm_age_cd, vm_age, vm_sexd_cd, vm_sexd, spt_otlnmap_at, rdse_stts_cd, rdse_stts, acdnt_ocrn_plc, acdnt_expln, road_div, road_no, road_nm, otn_acdnt_no, pol_sta_code, oot_se_cd, oot_se, acc_cls_partcarea, pol_acdnt_no, sel_fcr, road_type, intndnc_id, office_id, moct_link_id, acdnt_frm_lv1, acdnt_frm_lv2, acdnt_frm_lv3, acdnt_sta_lv1, acdnt_sta_lv2, cd_069, ar_wod_pt_cd, ar_wod_pt, vm_wod_pt_cd, vm_wod_pt, frst_rgtr_id, frst_reg_dt, last_rene_id, last_updt_dt, acc_cls from datamart.trns_acdnt_ocrn_brnch
crt_dt >= #{crtDt} AND offe_vhcl_carmdl_lclsf_cd = '210'
order by crt_dt
